'Success' is an unincorporated community in Texas County, Missouri, United
States. It is located about twelve miles northwest of Houston at the southern
intersection of Routes 17 and 32. The community was founded in 1883 and was
originally known as Wye City. The Success R-VI School District has a K-8
enrollment of 100 students. The students attend Houston, Plato and Licking for
high school.
categories: Unincorporated communities in Texas County, Missouri
